value.name: Don't Panic!
value.overview: Lucy Ayoub and Guri Alfi go out into the field to check how the State of Israel is preparing for the next disaster. They meet in the series the functionaries, experts and Israelis who are preparing for the various disasters. The series also incorporates filmed drama-comedy clips in which the two also experience a simulation of the disaster themselves, using special effects and quite a bit of computer work.
